title: Freight and supply chains in 2026, key trends shaping the year ahead
summary:
After years of pandemic shocks, congestion and rate whiplash, 2026 is not being defined by a single crisis, but by slower growth and deeper structural change in how freight and supply chains operate.
Most outlooks point to modest trade expansion, persistent geopolitical risk and sharper regulatory pressure, meaning logistics leaders must deliver resilience, visibility and sustainability without the tailwind of booming demand.
The question is no longer whether disruption will occur, ...

title: Cosco facing $1.2m claim over disputed D&D charges to NVOCC
summary:
Allegations of multiple violations of the US Shipping Act are spreading gloom over Cosco this holiday season, after an NVOCC levelled a claim against the carrier, with the Federal Maritime Commission (FMC), for $1.2m.
California-headquartered MAC Industries has accused Cosco of claiming detention and demurrage charges (D&D) for a shipment no longer under its control, and prematurely cancelling a contract when MAC disputed the charges.
